attributes.action: Petition for Parent/Child Parking Badges in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
These spaces are essential for unloading buggies, car seats, and giving kids space to get in and out safely.

A clear, regulated badge system would help ensure these bays are used properly and fairly.

Support the call for change, please sign and share!
attributes.background:
I am calling for the introduction of official Parent/Child Parking Badges — similar to the Blue Badge system for families with children up to their 16th birthday.

Too often, parent/child spaces are misused by people without children, leaving families struggling to find safe, accessible parking.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Give permits for parent and child bays to stop the misuse of these spaces 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728595
